post1.title: In Phase EP
post1.description: Xcope melds ambient tones and percussive electronic rhythms to create visual worlds.

post2.title: Xcope @ heds opening LA + sober rob - GO! release party
post2.description: Debut of @_xcope_ at the @sober_rob @heds.world release party. I've been really into ukg, 2 step, and house lately so it felt right to start a new project with all those influences.
